app.name: Movie Picture Stitching
app.description: A modern plugin for vertically stitching multiple images into panoramic compositions with glass effect UI

settings.qualityHelp: Higher value = better quality, larger file
settings.qualityNotApplicable: PNG is lossless - quality setting not applicable
settings.cropHelp: Top and bottom crop total cannot exceed 99%

formatOptions.jpg: JPG - Suitable for photos, smaller file size
formatOptions.webp: WEBP - Modern format, smaller file size

messages.selectImages: Please select images to stitch first
messages.selectFolder: Please select a folder in Eagle first
messages.generatePreview: Please click preview button to generate image first

tooltips.cropTop: Set the height percentage to crop from the top of images
tooltips.cropBottom: Set the height percentage to crop from the bottom of images
tooltips.exportQuality: Set the quality of exported image, range 0.1-1.0
tooltips.exportFormat: Choose the format for exported image
tooltips.formatJpg: JPEG format - good compression, smaller files
tooltips.formatWebp: WebP format - best compression, modern browsers
tooltips.preview: Generate a preview of the stitched image
tooltips.save: Save the stitched image to Eagle current folder

interface.noImagesSelected:
No images selected
Please select images to stitch in Eagle
interface.tooManyImages: Too many images selected (over 50), please reduce selection
interface.cropParameterError: Crop parameter error: Top + bottom crop cannot exceed 100%
interface.imageLoadFailed: {{count}} images failed to load, continuing with remaining images
interface.imageSizeExceeded: Image size too large, please reduce image count or resolution

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.firstUseHint: Tip: Use {preview} to preview, {save} to save. Press F1 for all shortcuts.
